snippet: The Financial Services Authority has fined Nicholas Kyprios, head of European credit sales at Credit Suisse, for disclosing confidential client information, the latest in a number of prominent actions by the British regulator.
abstract: The Financial Services Authority has fined Nicholas Kyprios, head of European credit sales at Credit Suisse, for disclosing confidential client information, the latest in a number of prominent actions by the British regulator.

headline.main: British Regulator Fines Credit Suisse Executive
